TopicTitle: Squad can we please have the patch that you have.

Articles.Content:
My game was freezing up today. Had to force close to keep going. Then it froze again. I watched a few others that have had their game crash. They reloaded and then crash again. Some have just run into bugs and the game crashed. 

Any chance the bugs that were found before 1.0 are going to be fixed. 

So can we have the bugs you have fixed or do we have to wait for the full release some time in the future.

...Not sure if you're serious or not.

There have been two patches shipped out after 1.0. So a huge quantity of bugs have been fixed already.

Are you up to date?
